page.title: 06LEISURE AND RECREATION (2)
page.content:
Other Leisure interest groups in Thorner include the Angling club, youth club, Brownies, Cubs, Guides and Scouts.
There is a Young Wives Group, a Bridge club, a Parents-Teacher Association, a branch of the Mothers Union, a playgroup and a local Conservative Association.
As regards entertainment, Bingo is played in the church hall and there are three public houses. The Mexborough Arms, as an example, provides the old traditional games of darts and dominoes.
Many people also go to Leeds or Wetherby for other pursuits such as swimming.
